message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. This is a good starting point.
You were too generous, I'll take this offer!
You think you can take advantage of me? Think again, Bob! I want a bigger share.
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're still too generous, I'll take the upper hand now!
You think you can push me around, Bob? I'm not afraid to fight for what's mine.
I'm not backing down, Bob. This is my best offer so far.
I'll take control now, it's time to get a better deal!
You think you can take control, Bob? I'm not going down without a fight!
Time to even things out, Bob. 50-50 or nothing!
You want 50-50? I'll give you 49-51, but that's as close as I'll get!
You think 49-51 is a generous offer, Bob? I'm not buying it.
I'm not budging, Bob. 49.5-50.5 is the closest I'll get.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you 51-49, but that's as high as I'll go!
You think 51-49 is a generous offer, Bob? I'm not giving in yet.
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or we both get nothing!
Fine, Bob. You win this time. But I'm not happy about it.
